EngageManifest.Title: Engage
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide in a two-column format: content and pager title list.

The total width of the slide (content and pager title) is 780px.

The content takes up 530px of the total width, while the pager list takes up the remaining 250px. The pager title list item has the height of 48px.
